title: 服务器后台提示mysql出现了这样的问题
author: Littorioflag
txt_content:
The last packet sent  to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.
 Database Error: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
导致现在无法通过WASD键前进了，CPU占用4%，内存15%，不存在配置渣的问题

replies.author: Littorioflag
replies.txt_content: 腾讯云的mysql，不知道怎么设置

replies.author: 凯文丶
replies.txt_content: 服务器连接数据库发生阻碍，提示数据库错误
